description: Defines a utility function 'invariant' for assertions, ensuring conditions are met at runtime.

methods.name: export function invariant(condition: unknown, message?: string): asserts condition { invariant
methods.description: Throws an error if the given condition is falsy, optionally with a custom message.

ctags.name: invariant
ctags.pattern: /^export function invariant(condition: unknown, message?: string): asserts condition {$/
